where is a howto from switching between: I have an old box and don't need the GUI running all of the time
where is a howto from switching between CLI and XFCE GDM?  I have an old box and don't need the GUI running all of the time
Press Ctrl-Alt-F1 to switch to an unused cli
the following command removes GDM from startup: sudo for i in 2 3 4 5; do mv S99gdm K99gdm; done;
you can start gdm by issuing: sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start
